entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Enum.GetValues(Type) should have an aot safe implementation #72140
  • Double to decimal conversion loses precision #72135
  • Importer's spilling logic is incomplete in subtle ways #72133
    8.0.0
  • [Breaking change]: Calls to BinaryFormatter APIs to produce build errors #72132
    7.0.0
  • ILASM roundtrip fails on `poison.sh` #72127
    7.0.0
  • Decimal to double conversion loses precision #72125
    Future
  • [Question] Type.GetTypeCode And Half Type #72123
  • [API Proposal]: Rename resourceID in PartitionedRateLimiter #72121
  • mono `minijit` runtime tests failing with `coreclr_initialize failed - Error: 0x80004005` on OSX/x64 #72114
    Future
  • System.Number.BigInteger.DivRem can output an incorrect remainder #72113
  • Brand dotnet/runtime to NET 8 #72112
    8.0.0
  • Packages need to stabilize for shipping .NET 7 #72111
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal] Expose missing BinaryPrimitives APIs #72107
    Future
  • [wasm] `mono-aot-cross` crashing all `performance` `wasm-aot` jobs #72105
  • [wasm] All `performance` jobs failing due to NRE in `BenchmarkDotNet.Autogenerated.UniqueProgramName.AfterAssemblyLoadingAttached` #72104
  • [API Proposal]: Add new overloads to ReadFromJsonAsync method in HttpContentJsonExtensions #72103
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration intermittent failures #72101
  • System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonReaderTests.ReadJsonStringsWithComments rolling build failure on net7.0-Linux-Release-arm-CoreCLR_checked-(Alpine.314.Arm32.Open)Ubuntu.1804.ArmArch.Open@mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet-buildtools/prereqs:alpine-3.14-helix-arm32v7-20210910135806-8a6f4f3 #72100
  • ObservableGauge holds disappeared metrics #72099
  • HttpStress is not running on Windows in CI #72096
    7.0.0
  • .net6.0 app publish in anyCPU does not run on windows 32bits #72092
  • `Debug.Fail` in `UpgradeToRegexGeneratorCodeFixer` is reachable #72085
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'sizeBytes != 0' #72081
  • [API Proposal]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.RefEscapesAttribute #72074
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT + trimming docs should reflect new TrimMode #72071
  • Test failure JIT\\CodeGenBringUpTests\\ArrayMD1_do\\ArrayMD1_do.cmd #72069
    7.0.0
  • High Private Memory Size on CentOS #72067
    Future

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Expose _dayNumber of DateOnly #72138
  • `double` representation of `decimal.MaxValue` cannot be converted properly to `decimal` #68042
    7.0.0
  • Profiler.Tests.GCBasicTests test failure #67106
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6.0.4 incorrect profiler callback sequence (CRITICAL) #68760
    7.0.0
  • ReadyToRun executable crashes at Marshal.StructureToPtr when trying to Marshal an Inherited class #63106
    7.0.0
  • IndexOutOfRangeException in WinMD assembly resolution #58319
    7.0.0
  • Developers can leverage Edit-and-Continue on Windows ARM64 #69907
    7.0.0
  • PGO: Various System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.* tests fail with NullReferenceException #71611
    7.0.0
  • RegexGenerator fixer hijacks formatting #71852
    7.0.0
  • Incorrect TypeLoadException message for byref field in non-byref-like type #72090
  • MethodInfo.Invoke AVs when invoking a method with an 'out void*' parameter #59068
    7.0.0
  • CertGetCertificateChain memory leak in pure Windows 7 system #68892
  • [API Proposal]: [QUIC] QuicStream #69675
    7.0.0
  • The successors of the RegularExpressionAttribute always return false. #51499
    7.0.0
  • Assert failure: m_alignpad == 0 in LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests #68511
    7.0.0
  • Tracking: Reflection issues which would be breaking changes if fixed #40737
    7.0.0
  • `UpgradeToRegexGeneratorAnalyzer` should support top-level statements #70835
    7.0.0
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection Methods in .NET 6 - Alpine Linux > 3.14 #72057
  • [API Proposal]: RateLimitPartition rename Create methods #71352
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Rename RateLimiter.WaitAsync #71775
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 4/8/2022 8:59:46 PM #67916
  • OSR failure in System.Text.Json.Tests #67152
    7.0.0
  • Cannot configure HttpHandler in DI with Azure Functions v4 #71130
  • [JSInterop] cannot build System.Net.Http.sln #72052
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Linker crashing with `System.NotImplementedException: switch` #71848
  • The `JsonSerializerOptions.TypeInfoResolver` property should be nullable #71960
    7.0.0
  • system.net.security.tests work item timeout on mono #71997
  • Add better API to support communication with Kerberos endpoints #62202
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: [QUIC] QuicConnection #68902
    7.0.0
  • Runtime support for multi-architecture installations #50798
    7.0.0
  • Can't execute dotnet-arm64 on asuswrt #42497
    7.0.0
  • Host errors and trace should be improved #42607
    7.0.0
  • ILAsm errors when entrypoint method declared on an interface #49998
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.JSImportExportTest.JSImportObject #71990
    7.0.0
  • Test SetValueDirect_GetValueDirectRoundDataTest failed: Expected 222; Actual -1 #71890
    7.0.0
  • When is AOT + MakeGenericType safe? #71625

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Workload runtimepack 6 #72147
    area-Build-mono
  • Properly calculate the ELF unwind info section size #72146
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update runtime repo to use Preview 6 SDK #72145
  • Re-enable releaseondetach profiler test #72144
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #72143
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0-preview7] Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn (for LibraryImportGenerator). #72142
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix error handling for generic arguments constrained as Enums #72141
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix tar checksum calculation bug #72139
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix visibility of SslStreamCertificateContext fields #72137
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: teach VN to fold type comparisons #72136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix loop scaling when removing a block #72134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-preview7] Add support for building WASM variants alongside single-threaded to the build system #72130
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • Add diagnostic suppressor for the MarkMethodsAsStatic diagnostics on custom marshallers #72129
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Added DEBUG switches for roundtrip ILASM #72128
  • [mono] Pass the pending exception correctly from interp_runtime_invok… #72126
    arch-wasm
  • [Mono][Arm64] Instrinsify methods for Vector4 on Arm64 #72124
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Support caller-allocated buffer for stateless collection marshalling #72122
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add `perf-wasm` pipeline #72119
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RateLimiting] Fix test race with timer #72118
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Fix undisposed RegistryKeys in Microsoft.Win32.Registry tests #72117
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Fix more SafeHandle cleanup in Windows crypto PAL #72116
    area-System.Security
  • Fix System.Number.BigInteger.DivRem outputting an incorrect remainder #72115
  • Annotating libraries with small number of warnings to be AOT safe #72108
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Port getifaddrs implementation from Xamarin.Android #72097
  • Implement HttpProtocolException for HTTP/3 #72095
    area-System.Net.Http
  • #60582 enable ExtractToDirectoryExtension_Unicode on ios/tvos #72091
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Remove an assert from impHWIntrinsic #72084
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix WritePGOData #72083
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Adapt System.CommandLine (v2) in more places #72082
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [fxr] Use std::find_if when searching for root framework. #72080
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Correctly find the node to fix in regex generator codefix #72079
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Tar: restore directory permissions while extracting. #72078
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix all outstanding S.Linq.Expressions failures #72077
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Simplify AppModel addToProject settings #72072
    area-Meta
  • Improve reliability of WarningsAsErrors replacement #72070
    area-Meta, 7.0.0

Merged

  • [mono][workloads] Clean up runtime pack versioning logic #72073
  • ILASM - Disable `fileversionpreservation` test #71972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix handling of non-bidirectional MarshalMode.Default with collection marshalling #72075
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn (for LibraryImportGenerator). #71652
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Avoid unnecessary duplication of XxCng instances #72120
    area-System.Security
  • Port perf improvement changes in new API back to runtime. #72109
  • Make 'RC' lowercase in versions.props #72110
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • If the base type is a sequential zero-sized type, treat a derived auto-layout type as starting from field offset 0. #72065
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] API QuicConnection (#71783), QuicStream (#71969), QUIC public (#72031) #72106
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix style issue in X509ChainPolicy.Clone and add some tests #72066
    area-System.Security
  • Add support for building WASM variants alongside single-threaded to the build system #71054
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Ensure object derefs do not remove previous conditions in loop cloning #72098
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix issue where the code fixer is not preserving the leading and trailing trivia for the regex generator #72042
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix typeloader error messages for invalid byref fields #72102
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • JIT: Disqualify delegate calls to instance methods on value classes from GDV explicitly #72089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-preview7] Mark JsonSerializerOptions.TypeInfoResolver as nullable and linker-safe #72087
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][aot] Make the gc pin area smaller. #71807
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [QUIC] System.Net.Quic API made public #72031
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [QUIC] API QuicStream #71969
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Bump main version to RC1 #72068
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Support top-level statements in regex analyzer #72046
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] API QuicConnection #71783
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/6.0] Fix building with clang 14 #69990
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [RateLimiting] Rename WaitAsync and RateLimitPartition methods #72054
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Show correct and complete function names on callstack #72048
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Backport action: fix link to set org membership visibility #72005
  • Fix solution files via slngen #72059
    area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Re-enable `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.csproj` #72076
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries, disabled-test
  • More reliably clean up more SafeHandle instances #71991
    area-System.Security
  • Mark JsonSerializerOptions.TypeInfoResolver as nullable and linker-safe #72044
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix ConsoleStream.Flush to not throw for stdin #72035
    area-System.Console
  • ILASM - Allow EntryPoint methods to be on interfaces #71975
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Properly report `TypedReference` with `ref` fields. #72062
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Centralize calling convention handling #71999
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add a fabricbot task to add issues to the AppModel project #71672
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Fix RSA OAEP decryption in Android with non-power-of-two key lengths #71696
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, os-android, 6.0.9
  • [release/6.0] Fixing the handling of Positive NaN in Math.Min for float/double #70865
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 6.0.8
  • createdump improvements for better VS4Mac Watson bucketing #71863
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.9
  • Add predefined cpu names for --instruction-set (e.g. haswell) #71911
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • [mono] Removing UnmanagedCallersOnly_MonoAot tests #71535
    area-Interop-mono
  • Get rid of hardcoded sleep in tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource #72010
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix for #70007, fallback to old implementation if optimized way fails #70073
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Use `-unicode` instead of `/unicode` for linux ildasm roundtrip tests #71958
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Double to Decimal Conversion Refactor (WIP) #70602
    area-System.Numerics
  • [wasm] reduce legacy interop usage #72021
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Mix newer kernel versions into library test matrix #71740
    area-Meta
  • [NativeAOT] thread suspension on Unix #71187
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] Fix some System.Net tests #71385
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm] Support network status information #71941
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Do not consider single-reg bitcasts multi-reg nodes #72020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger][firefox] Added exception handling for Firefox onEval #72011
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add setter to TransactionManager.DefaultTimeout and MaxTimeout. #71703
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Port Windows/MSDTC distributed transactions support #72051
    area-System.Transactions
  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add TieredPGO and ReadyToRun to Microsoft-Windows-DotNETRuntime/TieredCompilation/Settings event #72056
    area-VM-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Rewriting Scalar<T> to be replaceable by linker stubs when not used as a fallback #71826
    NO-REVIEW
  • Update convention how to ref&pkg an analyzer again #69237
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add missing inlining attribute (System.Numerics.Vector3) #72058
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][aot] Avoid making the 'this' variable volatile. #71799
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Linker to NativeAOT sync #71485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make Type.GetTypeCode/IsEnum intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Tear down pending HTTP connection when the originating request completes #71785
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Utilize ProtocolException for HTTP/2 in HttpStress #72034
    area-System.Net.Http
  • fixes #71185 #71926
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • ConfigurationBinder should support binding private properties from ba… #71039
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fixing PhysicalFilesWatcher path maintenance (Issue #71386) #72041
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • Socket: cancel on-going operations when Sockets with non-owning handle gets disposed. #72000
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • #65560 Added FileCreateCaseSensitive for ios/tvos simulators #71948
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • [LoongArch64] add crossgen2 for LoongArch64. #72017
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Utilize new APIs more in System.Formats.Asn1 #72055
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, community-contribution
  • Always use live host #71725
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • perf fixes for high memory load situation #61926
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey #66918
    area-Microsoft.Win32, tenet-performance
  • JIT: Remove GTF_CALL_M_UNMGD_THISCALL and badcode on thiscall with 0 args #71882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Work around for UriFormatException caused by \\?\ prefix in the path #71452
    area-System.Configuration

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-13
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Emit cold nodes last without relying on ClassCode #1934

Merged

  • Fix unwind info for cold EH funclets on ARM64 #1930

Updated

  • Custom attributes #1933

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't update packages NU1007 : runtime.json could not be found #26551
  • error : The project file cannot be opened by the project system, because it is missing some critical imports or the referenced SDK cannot be found. #26543
  • Allow projects to control which configuration is used by default when publishing #26534

Closed

  • SDK 6.0.301 -> 6.0.302 upgrade breaks our build #26557
  • Update of Visual Studio (17.6.2) and SDK (6.0.302) prevents the use of source generators for Microsoft.Toolkit.MVVM #26542
  • dotnet pack replaces wildcard version of reference with current actual version #26167
    Discussion
  • Add additional details on the workload version in dotnet workload --list #22148
    6.0.4xx

PullRequests

Created

  • BinaryFormatter obsolete as error in net7 #26559
  • Exclude VS references from source build #26556
    Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Update the RIDs target to the latest one #26096
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the RID to the latest #26540
  • Fix incorrect WarningsAsErrors elements #26537
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Trusted roots: May 2022 CTL #26403
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #26529
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add --info Option to Workload Base Command For Future Triage #26458
    Area-Workloads
  • Nit code clean-up in RuleRunner #26475
    Area-Compatibility

Updated

  • Use the Implicit SDK RID for RID-Specific Apps by Default #26143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • For build-from-source builds of .NET, opt-out of Microsoft telemetry #25935
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow dotnet workload update print-download-link-only to use fallback and work with prior SDK versions #26369
    Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1876462 #26531
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Consume the razor source generator via nuget package #26399
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge pull request #22974 from dotnet/marcpopMSFT-updateappinsights #26508
    Area-Infrastructure
  • MSBuild server V2 #26104
    Area-CLI
  • dotnet/templating#3829 evaluating project context for dotnet new execution #26523
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate dotnet new Cli, dotnet-new3, *.IntegrationTests, *.UnitTests, template_feed to SDK #26521
    Area-Templates
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26500
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal] Add ability to declare global usings for namespaces, types and aliases by using a command line switch #3428
    10.0
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Add lambda/method group defaults proposal #6274
  • Spec forbidding constant numeric patterns on `INumberBase<T>` #6273

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Convert Type to Record #62623
  • [API Proposal]: ModuleInitializerAttribute for VB.NET #62625
  • No error reported assigning through ref local of ref struct type after ref assigning parameter #62618
  • Accessing static abstract operators gives unclear error message #62614
  • Square brackets not expanding correctly in Visual Studio #62613
  • False IDE0055 (Fix formatting) reported when using multiple TargetFrameworks #62612
  • XML Documents for Positional Records don't show example property #62611
  • Report when the same analyzer is passed multiple times #62610
  • Semantic Snippets - Constructor Snippet #62608
    17.4
  • Semantic Snippets - Interface Snippet #62607
    17.4
  • Semantic Snippets - Struct Snippet #62606
    17.4
  • Semantic Snippets - Class Snippet #62605
    17.4
  • Semantic Snippets - Property Snippet #62604
    17.4
  • Potential infinite loop parsing anonymous types. #62603
    17.4

Closed

  • No error for ref fields in non-ref structs #62596
    17.4
  • CSharpWrappingCodeRefactorProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #61362
    Backlog
  • Roslyn ships (parts) of System.Composition #20620
    Backlog
  • 'CSharpWrappingCodeRefactoringProvider' encountered an error #62379
  • Provide visual studio 2022 templates without top level statement, just make it an option #58217
    Backlog
  • Xml doc produced for function pointers have a blank type #62565
    C# 12.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES.txt and Signing.props for StructuredLogger #62628
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Address feedback on the "references newer compiler" diagnostic in the analyzer loader #62627
    Area-Compilers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1879091 #62626
  • Apply changes directly to text buffer - take 2 #62617
    Area-IDE
  • Cleanup: remove VisualStudioWorkspaceImpl.TryGetContainedDocument #62616
    Area-IDE
  • Bind IterationErrorVariable to a natural type for error recovery #62601
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Interpolated String Improvements

Merged

  • EnC: A couple of small fixes #62454
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62574
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Report error for ref field declared in type other than ref struct #62615
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Store helpful info needed by incremental-generation on syntax-tree itself #62551
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62619
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62621
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62620
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1875846 #62579
  • Provide parse options to the language service more quickly #60855
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add "Needs Design Review" and comment to every PR that modifies public APIs. #62588
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix out of bounds in wrapping refactoring #62602
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use "file local types" instead of "file types" #62514
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Exclude redundant VS assemblies from vsix #62609
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Revert "Apply changes directly to text buffer (#62337)" #62589
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62600
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62599
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62598
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62595
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62594
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62593
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Run EndToEnd tests in a more isolated/controlled environment #62433
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62590
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62592
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62591
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62585
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62587
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62586
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Theme the Generate Type Dialog #62581
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use top level statements does not have an accelerator key in display name for Visual Studio #42719
  • ConfigureRouteHandlerJsonOptions naming #42718
  • Signing certificates on the fly in `ServerCertificateSelector` can not return the signed certificate. #42715
    Discussions
  • OutOfProcess and IIS Threads #42713
  • Blazor :Code doesn't compile following official documentation #42710
  • When the 'no-cache' Response Caching Header set, 'max-age' still required. #42705
  • Remove RequestDelegateFactory call from RouteEndpointBuilder #42703
    7.0-rc1

Closed

  • Add "readDoubleField", "readByteField", ... to Blazor #42687
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer: Need support for password grant type #42711
  • "The path must be absolute" when running Blazor.Server in Linux docker #42684
  • IJSRuntime in documentation #42693
  • Wasm is Not Caching the blazor-resource #42714
  • Question: Process for adding a provider to the "Community Maintained Store Providers" documentation #42663
  • SpaProxyLaunchManager invoked with wrong path in VS 2022 for Mac #42707
  • Blazor :StateHasChanged() Throws Exception When Called By Executing Background Tasks #42709
  • Migration strategy with abstraction from ASP.NET webapi to ASP.NET Core #42696

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Web Application Builder analyzers/fixers and tests #42724
  • Rename EmptyServiceProvicer => EmptyServiceProvider #42723
    area-runtime, community-contribution

    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, feature-templates
  • Mark SignalR SourceGen as not shipping for RC and RTM #42720
    area-signalr
  • HTTP/3: Avoid ConnectionAbortedException allocations #42708
    area-runtime
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Updated documentation for ASP.NET Identity Community Providers #42689
    area-identity, community-contribution, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix TreatSpecificWarningsAsErrors elements #42717
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Yarn Housekeeping for Blazor/JSInterop #42537
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-rc1
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #42695
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.28
  • Update branding to 7.0.0-rc1 #42682
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • [dotnet user-jwts] Move signing key details to top-level property #42674
    area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts
  • Improve Default Blazor WebAssembly Loading Experience #42548
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview7
  • Adding ProblemDetailsService #42384
    area-web-frameworks
  • Introduce per-HealthCheck periodicity #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • HTTP/3: Avoid per-request cancellation token allocations #42685
    area-runtime
  • Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • Add IgnoreQueryString parameter to NavLink #40990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [Migrated] - Generate Composite Images Redistributable #42506
    area-infrastructure
  • Allow cancellation of navigation events in Blazor #42638
    area-blazor
  • Support loading OIDC options from configuration #42679
    area-security, area-web-frameworks
  • [Blazor] Dynamic authentication requests #42692
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm-auth
  • Make route handler filters work for MVC controllers #42557
    area-mvc
  • Route tooling #42597
    area-web-frameworks
  • Efficiently buffer to disk #42672

  • Trim identity #42675

entry.content:

Created

  • [Shell][Win] No animal like a Xaminal #8714

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error: "The entity type 'DataProtectionKey' requires a primary key" when using .Net 7 previews, EF Core and Linux #28444
  • Json: allow TPT/TPC mapping if only the most derived type contains json-mapped entities #28443
  • Json: add support for table splitting on the entities that own json entities #28442
  • Json : add support for json mapped entities owned by a regular owned entity #28441
  • Cannot UPDATE ... RETURNING or call stored procedure * in .FromSqlRaw() when entity has owned properties #28440
  • Allow configuring sproc mapping to use parameter names for invocation #28439
  • Support configuring parameters with constant values for sproc mapping #28438
  • Remove old property overrides when a sproc mapping is removed/renamed #28437
  • Ability to specify more facets for sproc parameters and result columns #28436
  • Add optimistic concurrency support to CUD sproc mapping #28435
  • Add "table" splitting support to CUD sproc mapping #28434
  • Add entity splitting support to CUD sproc mapping #28433

Closed

  • Simplify single data deletion code #28404
  • EntityFrameworkCore 3.1.26 on WIndows 10 LTSB 2015 (.NET 4.6.2 Application) #28284
  • Property 'AutoGenerateBindingRedirects' is incorrectly set to true for some project types #28194
  • Support unidirectional many-to-many relationships through shadow navigations #3864
    7.0.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • Update to .NET SDK 7 Preview 6 #28431

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #28428
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #28427
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Update broken link to xunit.net #28429
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0-preview7' => 'main' #28430
    auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Unidirectional many-to-many relationships #28371
    auto-merge
  • Query: Entity splitting support for regular entities #28425
    auto-merge
  • Update branding to 7.0.0-rc1 #28420
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Json Columns initial work #28171
  • feat: validate reserve invalid file characters on migrations name #28367
    waiting-for-response
